scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm run local-services"  "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/demo.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network -b http://127.0.0.1:54000 webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:55000
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
